items.name: bdf.input.file
items.label: BDF输入文件
items.helpText: 上传文件时 请勿离开该页面

data.doc:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<descriptor id="TAITHEM" filled="true">
    <options narrow="false" name="base.parameter" info="基本参数" id="basic">
        <option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.text" required="false" name="job.name" label="作业名称" id="JOB_NAME" hidden="false"></option>
        <option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" name="core.number" label="核数" id="NCPU" hidden="false">
            <option selected="false" id="2">2</option>
            <option selected="true" id="4">4</option>
            <option selected="false" id="8">8</option>
        </option>
        <option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" name="queue" label="队列" id="QUEUE" hidden="false">
            <option selected="true" id="Queue_40">Queue_40</option>
        </option>
    </options>
    <options narrow="false" name="application.parameter" info="应用参数" id="application">
        <option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.remotelocate.file" width="42" height="3" required="true" name="bdf.input.file" label="BDF输入文件" id="INPUT_OPT" hidden="false" helpText="上传文件时 请勿离开该页面"></option>
        <option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.remotelocate.file" width="42" required="false" label="其他文件" id="OTHER_FILES" hidden="false"></option>
    </options>
    <options narrow="false" name="install.application.parameter" info="应用程序安装参数" id="mandatory">
        <option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.text" required="false" name="nastran.executable.path" label="NASTRAN可执行程序路径" id="NASTRAN_CMD" hidden="false"></option>
        <option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.text" required="false" name="license.file.path" label="许可证文件路径" id="LM_LICENSE_FILE" hidden="false"></option>
    </options>
</descriptor>
